reviewText: Good Communications.  Great Product.  Quick Service.  Rated AAA+++.  Thank You.  BEG

I have watched and  cried every time I have viewed these films. Life and death are fragile. Circumstances connect us all.  We have only to open our hearts and be ready for whatever comes our way.  These films have inspired me to reconnect with long lost family and remember those who attempted to set us on the road to life and know how to handle what we will face.  Every family should have these films, I buy these films and give them to people who may need a good, cleansing cry.
Bought the collection for my mom. She loves it.
great.
I love these movies
Shed some tears, but great holiday movies.
Was a gift

Good movies, but all but the Christmas Choir involve traumatic deaths--kind of morbid at Christmas-time.  They have happily ever after endings, but I still wouldn't watch them with my little kids, for sure.
Four for the price of one! Cannot go wrong!

This pack of 4 Faith and Family Holiday movies is very good.  I had the Christmas shoes but when I saw this pack, I thought I would get the movies together.  the acting is great.  The life stories are just that, they involve real life situations.  My faith means so much to me and when I can watch films that deal with faith, I just love it.  We need more movies like these.

I recommend these movies for anyone who wants to watch good movies, meaning no sex, no exploitation of anyone, no violence,  love, love and more love.
Love them all!

This was a wonderful DVD. My favorite was the Christmas Shoes and the Christmas Blessing. I have seen the DVD's a hundred times. It is a heart warming story, spanning 3 generations. This is a 5 star movie. Thanks Hallmark you are the very best ......
